data.eml:eml: Review of the flower-inhabiting water scavenger beetle genus Cycreon (Coleoptera, Hydrophilidae), with descriptions of new species and comments on its biology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arriaga-Varela, Emmanuel, Wong, Sin Yeng, Kirejtshuk, Alexander, Fikacek, Martin (2018): Review of the flower-inhabiting water scavenger beetle genus Cycreon (Coleoptera, Hydrophilidae), with descriptions of new species and comments on its biology. Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 65 (1): 99-115, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.65.26261, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.65.26261
